title.narrative: Cooperative Housing For Urban Poor Communities (ICOH)

description.narrative: Operationalised a functional office. Recruited 3 key staff for the project (Project Manager, Project Officer and Project Accountant). In the process of carrying out a strategic planning activity. Staff and board members trained on adequate housing model. Developed a 5-year strategic plan, Initiated a women advocacy forum known as "Kamukunji ya akina mama" through which women in Muslim village have been organised into 7 groups and their capacity on entrepreneurship developed. The women have already started engaging in income generating activities ranging from weaving door matts, tailoring, making detergents, making local fruit juices & jam. All these efforts are aimed at helping women to gain financial independence and enable them save towards access to adequate housing. Seven (7) VSLA for women formed. Embarked on process of promoting Housing Cooperatives using the housing Cooperative model that has so far resulted into formation of 3 housing cooperatives (Muming Housing Coop, Pamba Safi Housing Coop & Riruta Muslim Village Housing Coop) that are under registration with the government.

To support Urban Poor women and young people to adopt to the Co-operative Housing approach and realize their right to Housing. Expected results; Strong and accountable Housing Co-operative accessing adequate housing for its members, Empowered organization

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
